roleset.name: eat dinner, eating, properly and politely
roleset.note: DINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dine' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'eat'. (from dine.01-v predicate notes)
DINING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dine-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls dine-39.5. (from dining.01-n)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: The next stop on the itinerary was Chad , where Chen dined with Chad 's President Idris Debi .

example.name: with ADJ
example.text: No restaurant I 've worked in -LRB- and there have been quite a few - ranging from Subway to fine dining -RRB- would have found that kind of language acceptable , especially within earshot of customers .

example.name: both args
example.text: Their dining on native vegetation has cleared the way for nonnative trees, and maples, to thrive where oaks and hickories are supposed to be

example.name: living the high life
example.text: He and Mr. Roderick were even dining out together.
